issue.title: [Rust] Travis should run tests for Rust library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2376](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2376). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need travis to build the Rust library and run tests so that future PRs do not introduce regressions.

 

PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1819

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2376?focusedCommentId=16422770) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1819
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1819>
